topic.title: How to recover from a corrupt profile?

body.section: If you cannot open a database because the profile is corrupt, here is the sequence of steps to create a new default bootstrap.ace file:
1. Delete the bootstrap.ace file in the bundle directory.
2. Start up the bundle using the provided script
3. On startup, the environment will prompt you to with a config file dialog, with a place to enter a username and a password:
Enter a new username/password such as user "bootstrap" with password of "visit.bend"
4. The environment will now create the new default profile and allow you to log in.
Note that the edit and view paths are not set up, so you may have to edit your preferences pane before expected content will show up in the taxonomy view.
